title: VitaTrend Zeit 11/2: Pennsylvania, Trump/Thomas, Miss Argentina, Permacrisis, Litter Box, Recession, Rat Verified
itunes:title: VitaTrend Zeit 11/2: Pennsylvania, Trump/Thomas, Miss Argentina, Permacrisis, Litter Box, Recession, Rat Verified
description:
In this edition of VitaTrend Zeit, Jack and Miles discuss Pennsylvania contesting mail in ballots, how Trump lawyers saw Justice Thomas as 'only chance' to stop 2020 election certification, Miss Argentina and Miss Puerto Rico getting married, 'Permacrisis', 'Splooting' and other new words, Joe Rogan admitting there's no proof behind the litter box story, inflation being correlated with skyrocketing corporate profits?, and the 'Rat Verified' trend on Twitter!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
